page.title: 02Estate Agents
page.content: of Fulfords.Mr.Pow said that they get about twelve people each day in the winter and about thirty-forty people in the summer to find out information about moving house.The estate agents opens at 9 am until 5.30 pm.Sometimes some of the staff stay until about 7 pm to do paper work.The main shop opens at 9 am and closes at 5.30 pm.Behind Potters there is a little caravan where the staff have their tea_breaks.At the back of Potters there is a store room where there is a freezer which they keep the frozen food in.They employ some boys to wash and clean the floors and to stack the cardboard boxes.Every and Philips the solicitors opens at 9 am and closes at 5 pm.But Mr. Smith often stays behind at the office until about 6 pm to catch up on his work.
